ygData.subject: Re: black pearl
ygData.msgSnippet: okay, Black pearls are looted off of Aviak Avocets, and Centaur Corsers....they are very rare loot. I have yet to find one on a Griffon. approx sale of a black
ygData.messageBody:
okay, Black pearls are looted off of Aviak Avocets, and Centaur
Corsers....they are very rare loot. I have yet to find one on a Griffon.
approx sale of a black pearl is 300 to 400pp on Bristlebane server.

Aeramus Brainblaster lv29 enchanter almost 30 hehe

>
> From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
>
> don't think any are sold. I looted one of a griffin once. It was a freak
> find as I was level 10 at the time. Was walking along and *pop* this
> griffin corpse appears at my feet. I was looking around trying to figure
> out what was going on and *poof* it disappeared. I was sad till a few
> seconds later it reappeared at which point I pounced on it. Got a
feather,
> about 5p, and a black pearl. I was so excited when the NPC offered me 21p
> for the gem so I sold it. Sigh, didn't know how rare they are since you
> only can find them from loot supposedly. Anyhow, got one off a griffin.
> I'm guessing the max quality of looted gem is based on the level of the
> monster. No gurruantee you'll get a good gem but at least possiblity is
> there? So, perhaps other NPCs that are similar level or higher will also
> have black pearls?
>
> Azara, Povar
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Scott Davidson Lenker [mailto:slenker@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 12:13 PM

> Subject: [eqenchanters] black pearl
>
>
> From: Scott Davidson Lenker <slenker@...>
>
> Hey guys, i was wondering if anyone knew of a vendor that sells black
> pearls. That are supposedly rare, but caster's realm didn't include these
> on the NPC drops so I was thinking maybe someone sells them. Any clue?
